en.name: First Impressions
en.coverDescription: This course explores the power of first impressions, and how to avoid poor customer service attitudes and approaches. The art of choosing your attitude, as well as leaving your emotional baggage behind and starting each day afresh are explored. The session also demonstrates the 5 monsters of customer service, and the STANCE model for creating a great first impression.

fr.name: Faire une bonne première impression
fr.coverDescription: Ce cours explore le pouvoir de la première impression et offre des conseils pour éviter les mauvaises attitudes et approches en matière de service client. L'art de choisir son attitude, de laisser son bagage émotionnel de côté et de recommencer chaque jour du bon pied y est étudié. La session présente également les 5 monstres du service client et le modèle STANCE, qui permet de créer une excellente première impression.

de.name: Einen guten ersten Eindruck hinterlassen
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
This course explores the power of first impressions, and how to avoid poor customer service attitudes and approaches. The art of choosing your attitude, as well as leaving your emotional baggage behind and starting each day afresh are explored. The session also demonstrates the 5 monsters of customer service, and the STANCE model for creating a great first impression.
